General.Name: LGMS Berhad
General.Description: LGMS Berhad provides cybersecurity services and solutions in Malaysia and internationally. The company provides cyber risk prevention; cyber risk management and compliance; and cyber threat and incident response services. The company also offers penetration testing services, including web and mobile application penetration testing, source code review, wireless network penetration testing, CREST penetration testing, red team engagement, intelligence LED penetration testing, social engineering, IoT device penetration testing, SST security assessment, and cyber drill and blue team exercise stimulation. In addition, it offers compliance services, such as PCI DSS consulting, PCI DSS ASV scanning, ISO 27001 consulting, TISAX assessment, security posture assessment, government and compliance competency, ISO/IEC 15408 Consulting, and cybersecurity advisory services. Further, it offers forensics services, including digital forensics, cybersecurity incident response, and compromise assessment, as well as provides security training. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Subang Jaya, Malaysia.
